name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bleacher Nation Fantasy App (formerly Fantasy Life App) ESPN Connect

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps members of Bleacher Nation Fantasy App connect their ESPN fantasy football leagues to BNF's league sync feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension will allow Bleacher Nation Fantasy app (formerly Fantasy Life App) users to import their ESPN Fantasy Football League(s) into the BNF LeagueSync feature in order to get custom rankings, projections and more.
